long_desc.thetext:
BETA_JAVA8:
This ER will be used to implement/track code generation for method references

Created attachment 229803 Jesper's patch
This is the remaining pieces after the infrastructure code has been selected and released as fix for bug https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=405066

Fix and tests released via http://git.eclipse.org/c/jdt/eclipse.jdt.core.git/commit/?h=BETA_JAVA8&id=0289aebb6fa627fea939e01f195711f9b91bb1a6.
I also hooked up the new tests into RunAllJava8Tests and TestAll.
Thanks Jesper.
